parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: 0-based index of row; valid only if AllCells is set to false

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: 0-based index of column; valid only if AllCells is set to false

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden rows and columns in the Row and Column indexes, false to not

parameters.name: AllCells
parameters.description: True for all cells, false if not; if false, set Row and Column

parameters.name: Orientation
parameters.description: Text orientation as defined in swTableCellOrientation_e (see Remarks )

title: ITableAnnotation.SetCellTextOrientation
description: Sets the text orientation in the specified table cell.
signature:
void SetCellTextOrientation( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
,
   System.Boolean
AllCells
,
   System.Int32
Orientation
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: 0-based index of row; valid only if AllCells is set to false

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: 0-based index of column; valid only if AllCells is set to false

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden rows and columns in the Row and Column indexes, false to not

parameters.name: AllCells
parameters.description: True for all cells, false if not; if false, set Row and Column

parameters.name: Orientation
parameters.description: Text orientation as defined in swTableCellOrientation_e (see Remarks )

remarks: You can set Orientation to any member of swTableCellOrientation_e except swTableCellOrientation_Varies.
